articles.description: To minimize disruptions as virus cases surge, the C.D.C. halved the recommended isolation period for infected Americans who show no symptoms, to five days. Dr. Anthony Fauci says a vaccination requirement should “seriously be considered” for air travel.

articles.title: Study finds abrupt decline in the prevalence of cognitive impairment among older Americans - News-Medical.Net
